thread.title: Rita McCabe
thread.title_full: VIP Electronic Cigarette Ireland reviewed by Rita McCabe

author: Rita McCabe
title: Rita McCabe
text: I have been buying from VIP now for I'd say about 2 years. Their product is excellent, their service is excellent and they are very very helpful. Only thing I'm not happy about is they have changed their rewards scheme. I used to get points even when they gave a discount they changed this about 2 months ago. This is the only downside to VIP, bring back reward points for all purchases that would be good.
